trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Great Falls
There were no other sightings in Great Falls on or around August 17th 2000
Summary: Small metalic disc wabbling over Great Falls, Mont
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving S on interstate 15, 11 miles north of Great Falls, Montana. Directly over the city I saw a metallic object falling from the sky like someone dropped a feather. My initial reaction was a plane is in trouble. As Ikept looking it, it did not appear to have wings and was very silver metalliclooking. It appeared to be about 5000 feet high at initial glance. I was aparatrooper with the 82nd ABN and have a very good perception of altitude. Itdropped for about 1000 feet and then started very, very rapidly moving on a flatplane due SE. My wife is a Major in the Airforce. I have seen many, manyaircraft in 18 years with my wife. There is an Airf
